rows.label: qst000701_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmm, is there anyone who can help?
I'm going to lose at this rate...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0002
rows.name: Oh, hey there! Hello.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0003
rows.name:
Say, do you know about a
pure white beetle called
the Snow-White Rhino?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm competing with my friend Leif
to see who can catch one first...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0005
rows.name:
But I overheard something
the other day.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0006
rows.name:
Leif asked an old guy he knows to
get a Snow-White Rhino for him!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0007
rows.name:
I know it's dangerous for kids
to go near Seigle Fell, but
that's cheating, right?!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0008
rows.name: What do you think?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0009
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qst000701_msg0010
rows.name: Say Luchini should get it himself

rows.label: qst000701_msg0011
rows.name: Right? That's what I thought!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0012
rows.name:
That's why I want you to get
a Snow-White Rhino for me!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0013
rows.name: This is a proxy war!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0014
rows.name:
If Leif is going to play
dirty, then so will I.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0015
rows.name:
My mom told me not to do anything
dangerous, but she also said I
have to win the contest...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0016
rows.name:
This must be fate.
You'll help me, right?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0017
rows.name: What?! No way!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0018
rows.name:
The area around Seigle Fell, where
the Snow-White Rhinos are rumored
to be, is super dangerous.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0019
rows.name:
I heard even adults get hurt there.
If I went, it'd be my funeral!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0020
rows.name:
You've got that "Then you
shouldn't have made the bet"
look on your face, don't you?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0021
rows.name: I didn't have a choice.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0022
rows.name:
My mom's rule is that if
I'm challenged to a contest,
I have to accept.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0023
rows.name:
And I have to win.
That's what she says.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0024
rows.name:
Please! Catch a
Snow-White Rhino for me.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0025
rows.name: Yes! Thank you!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0026
rows.name:
I heard you can find Snow-White
Rhinos around Seigle Fell,
near the tail of Gula.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0027
rows.name:
But apparently, you can only see
them in the early morning...

rows.label: qst000701_msg0028
rows.name:
That's all I know, but
you can manage, right?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0029
rows.name:
I'll get your reward ready while
I wait, so I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst000701_msg0101
rows.name: Have you found a Snow-White Rhino yet?

rows.label: qst000701_msg0102
rows.name:
They say you can find them around
Seigle Fell, near the tail of Gula.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0103
rows.name:
But be careful, they only
appear in the early morning.

rows.label: qst000701_msg0104
rows.name: Good luck!
